snippet: The authorities say the gun used in the shootings in Chardon, Ohio, was bought legally in 2010.
abstract: Authorities state that T J Lane stole the pistol he used in his attack at Chardon High School from his grandfather's barn; pistol was purchased legally by his grandfather in 2010.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say the gun used in the shootings in Chardon, Ohio, was bought legally in 2010.

headline.seo: Origin of Gun in Ohio School Shooting Described
headline.main: Officials Speak of Origin of Gun in School Attack
headline.print_headline: Officials Speak Of Origin of Gun In School Attack
